description:
Balancing rock trail, is a short 1.5 km trail with 200 meters of vertical. From the top there is an excellent view of the Creston Valley.

You can also proceed to visit the wildlife centre after this short up hill walk.

Trail Crosses private land and goes under the power line.
directions:
West on Hwy 3 from Creston, turn left (south) at road to Creston Wild Life Centre. Turn  just under 8km west junction of Hwy 3 and Hwy 3A

There is a sign right there and you can park on side of road. Just under 8
